SA01mkarmviu:153_2: yadā manuṣyeṣūpapadyate. āḍhyeṣu kuleṣūpapadyate mahādhaneṣu mahābhogeṣu. tena dānaviśeṣeṇa

SA01mkarmviu:153_6: dattā. tena dṛṣṭvādīyamānā tena kṣavaṇaye na ca bhikṣā dattā. sa ca pravrājitaḥ paribhraṣṭaḥ.
SA01mkarmviu:153_7: sa tena karmaṇā divyamānuṣyakāḥ saṃpattayo 'nubhūya śrāvastyām agrakulikaputraḥ pratyājāto

SA01mkarmviu:153_10: iha bhagavann agrakulikaḥ kālagataḥ. tasya mayāputrakaṃ svāpateyaṃ gṛhītam. bhagavān
SA01mkarmviu:153_11: āha. katīyaṃ mahārāja gṛhapater dravyaṃ gṛhītam. sa āha. śataṃ bhagavan śatasahasrāṇāṃ
SA01mkarmviu:153_12: yad āhataṃ pariśiṣṭaṃ dravyam aparimitam anāhatam. bhagavān āha. idaṃ tasya mahārāja
SA01mkarmviu:153_13: saptamam aputrakaṃ dravyagrahaṇam. yat tena tagaraśikhī nāma pratyekabuddhaḥ piṇḍapātena

SA01mkarmviu:260_1: viśuddhalalāṭaḥ. snigdhacchaviḥ. saṃgatabhāṣī bhavati. na ca tṛṣābahulo bhavati.
SA01mkarmviu:260_2: tṛṣitasya [MKV_98] pānīyaṃ prādurbhavati. na ca preteṣūpapadyate. mahābhogaś ca bhavati.
SA01mkarmviu:260_3: svargeṣūpapadyate. kṣipraṃ ca parinirvāti. yathā cāha.
SA01mkarmviu:270_0: LXXIII. katame daśa guṇā mālāpradānasya. ucyate. mālābhūto bhavati lokasya. kāyād
SA01mkarmviu:270_1: daurgandhyam apaiti saugandhyaṃ prādurbhavati. nityasugandho nityālaṃkṛto bhavati.
SA01mkarmviu:270_2: abhedyaparivāro bhavati. sarvajanapriyo bhavati. mahābhogaś ca bhavati. svargeṣūpapadyate.
SA01mkarmviu:281_0: b) tathānyatarasya daridragṛhapater duhitā. sā khalu dvāre sthitā janapadaṃ sarvālaṃkārabhūṣitaṃ
SA01mkarmviu:281_1: paśyati. utsave ramamāṇam. sā pitaram āha. mām apy alaṃkuruṣveti. pitāha. kuto 'smākaṃ
SA01mkarmviu:281_2: daridrāṇām alaṃkāraḥ. eṣa janapadaḥ kṛtapuṇyo 'nekaśo buddhe bhagavati kṛtādhikāraḥ.
SA01mkarmviu:281_3: tena ca karmaṇā karṇesumanasya sthavirasyāvadānaṃ vistaraśas tasyoktam. evam alpo
SA01mkarmviu:281_4: 'pi bhagavati kṛtaḥ prasādo mahāphalo bhavati. tayā pitātīvoparodhitaḥ prayaccha
SA01mkarmviu:281_5: mama kiṃcid eṣo 'grato vihāraḥ atra bhagavataḥ pūjām upariṣyāmīti. tena duḥkhārtena
SA01mkarmviu:281_6: vibhave 'vidyamāne palālamayīṃ mālāṃ kṛtvā dattā. sā tāṃ palālamayīṃ mālāṃ gṛhya
SA01mkarmviu:281_7: buddhapratimāyāḥ śirasi dattvā pādayoḥ praṇipatya āha. bhagavann anena kuśalamūlena
SA01mkarmviu:281_8: saṃsāre saṃsaratyā mā bhūyaḥ dāridryaṃ syād iti. tasyāḥ prasādajātāyās tad ahar eva
SA01mkarmviu:281_9: mānuṣyaṃ strībhāvam atikrāntaṃ divyaṃ rūpaṃ prādurbhūtam. tadviṣayaprativāsinā ca
SA01mkarmviu:281_10: rājñāgradevī sthāpitā. kālagatā deveṣūpapannā. paścime 'pi ca bhave campāyām agrakulikasya
SA01mkarmviu:281_11: [MKV_100] duhitā pratyājātā paramakalyāṇī sauvarṇā cāsyā mālā sarvaratnamaṇḍitā śirasi
SA01mkarmviu:281_12: sahasaiva prādurbhūtā. mātāpitṛbhyāṃ vismayajātābhyāṃ mālinīty evāsyā nāma kṛtam.
SA01mkarmviu:281_13: yadā ca bhagavān abhisaṃbuddho rājagṛhāc campām anuprāptaḥ. sā copasaṃkrāntā. tasyāś
SA01mkarmviu:281_14: ca bhagavatā dharmadeśanā kṛtā pravrajitā cārhantī saṃvṛttā. sāha cittotpādād evāsyā
SA01mkarmviu:281_15: mā me bhūyo mālā bhavatv ity antarhitā. tāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā vismayaprāptā devatā gāthām anugāyate yathāha.
SA01mkarmviu:282: dattvā tu palālamayīṃ mālāṃ sā mālinī sugatasya caitye
SA01mkarmviu:285_0: LXXIV. katame daśa guṇā muktapuṣpapradānasya. ucyate. puṣpabhūto bhavati lokasya.
SA01mkarmviu:285_1: ghrāṇendriyaṃ viśudhyati. kāyadaurgandhyaṃ samapaiti. saugandhyaṃ prādurbhavati.
SA01mkarmviu:285_2: daśa diśaḥ śīlagandhaḥ khyātiṃ gacchati. abhigamanīyaś ca bhavati. lābhī ca bhavati
SA01mkarmviu:285_3: [MKV_101] iṣṭānāṃ dharmāṇām. mahābhogaś ca bhavati. svargeṣūpapadyate kṣipraṃ ca parinirvāti.
SA01mkarmviu:286: a) atra karṇesumanasya pūrvajanmani prasāde jāte ekaikapuṣpapradānasya vipāko vaktavyaḥ. yathā sa eva āha.
SA01mkarmviu:290_0: LXXV. katame daśa guṇā dīpapradānasya. ucyate. pradīpabhūto bhavati lokasya. māṃsacakṣur
SA01mkarmviu:290_1: naśyati. divyacakṣuḥ prādurbhavati. avidyāndhakāraṃ vidhamati. jñānāloka utpadyate.
SA01mkarmviu:290_2: kuśalākuśalān dharmān kṣipraṃ prajñayā pratividhyati. saṃsāre saṃsarato 'vidyāndhakāro
SA01mkarmviu:290_3: na bhavati. mahābhogaś ca bhavati. svargeṣūpapadyate. kṣipraṃ ca parinirvāti.
SA01mkarmviu:292_0: a) yathā coktam abhidharme cakravartisūtravibhaṅge. kasya karmaṇo vipākena rājā cakravartī
SA01mkarmviu:292_1: maṇiratnaṃ pratilabhate. dīrgharātraṃ rājñā cakravartinā dīpapradānāni pradattāni.
SA01mkarmviu:292_2: pradīpaikadānāni ca. andhakāre ratnapradīpā dhāritā. ye cakṣuṣmantas te samaviṣamāṇi
SA01mkarmviu:301_0: atrāryāniruddhasya dīpe divyacakṣur ṛṣīṇāṃ ca cakṣūtpāṭanamokṣāyaṇe vaktavyam. yathā
SA01mkarmviu:301_1: dīpamālāpradānena dīpaṅkareṇa buddhatvaṃ prāptam. yā ca śrāvastyāṃ cakṣuvikalena
SA01mkarmviu:301_2: pradīpamālā kāritā. saprasādo jātaḥ. praṇidhānaṃ kṛtavān. utthitasya cāsya yathā
SA01mkarmviu:301_3: paurāṇaṃ cakṣuḥ saṃvṛttam. ime daśa guṇā dīpapradānasya.
SA01mkarmviu:303_0: LXXVI. katame daśa guṇā gandhapradānasya. ucyate. gandhabhūto bhavati lokasya. ghrāṇendriyaṃ
SA01mkarmviu:303_1: viśudhyati. kāyadaurgandhyam apaiti. saugandhyaṃ prādurbhavati. daśa diśaḥ śīlagandhaḥ
SA01mkarmviu:303_2: pravāti. abhigamanīyo bhavati. lābhī ca bhavati iṣṭānāṃ dharmāṇām. mahābhogaś ca
SA01mkarmviu:304_0: a) yathoktam abhidharme cakravartisūtre. kasya karmaṇo vipākena rājñaś cakravartinaḥ
SA01mkarmviu:304_1: strīratnasya romakūpebhyaḥ śarīrād gandho nirgacchati. tadyathā gandhasamudgakasya.
SA01mkarmviu:304_2: dīrgharātraṃ tayā striyā caityagarbhagṛheṣu gandhopalepanāni dattāni. surabhīṇi ca
SA01mkarmviu:304_3: puṣpāṇi dhūpaś ca dattāḥ. stūpeṣu ca gandhasnāpanāni kṛtāni. tasya karmaṇo vipākena
SA01mkarmviu:304_4: rājñaś cakravartinaḥ strīratnasya śarīrād evaṃrūpo gandho nirgacchati. tadyathā gandhakaraṇḍasya.
SA01mkarmviu:306_0: LXXVII. katame daśa guṇāḥ pravrajyāyāḥ. ucyate. putrabhāryaduhitṛdhanatṛṣṇāsya na
SA01mkarmviu:306_1: bhavati. kāmasya parigraho na bhavati. araṇyavāse prītiṃ pratilabhate. buddhagocaraṃ
SA01mkarmviu:306_2: sevate. bālagocaraṃ vivarjayati. durgatigamanīyān dharmān vivarjayati. sugatigamanīyān
SA01mkarmviu:306_3: dharmān sevate. devā asya spṛhayanti. nityaṃ sugatavacane pravrajyāṃ pratilabhate.
SA01mkarmviu:307_0: LXXVIII. katame daśa guṇā araṇyavāsasya. ucyate. saṃgaṇikā vivarjayati. pravivekaṃ
SA01mkarmviu:307_1: sevate. dhyānālambanaṃ cittaṃ bhavati. na ca bahukarmakṛtyatāṃ prāpnoti. buddhānāṃ
SA01mkarmviu:307_2: smṛtiṃ yāti. prītisukhasaumanasyaṃ kāyo na jahāti. antarāyāś ca na bhavanti. brahmacaryasya
SA01mkarmviu:307_3: alpāyāsena samādhim adhigacchati. uddiṣṭaṃ cāsya padavyañjanaṃ na naśyati. yathāśrutānāṃ
SA01mkarmviu:307_4: dharmāṇāṃ vistareṇārtham ājānati. ime daśa guṇā araṇyavāsasya.
SA01mkarmviu:308_0: LXXIX. katame daśa guṇāḥ paiṇḍapātikatve. ucyate. caṅkramo 'sya upārjito bhavati.
SA01mkarmviu:308_1: gocaro 'sya prahato bhavati. māno 'sya nihato [MKV_105] bhavati. ātmānaṃ lābhena
SA01mkarmviu:308_2: yojayati. parān puṇye pratiṣṭhāpayati. śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ dīpayati. paścimāyā janatāyā
SA01mkarmviu:308_3: ālokaḥ kṛto bhavati. sabrahmacāriṇām upaghātaḥ kṛto na bhavati. nīcacittam upasthāpitaṃ
SA01mkarmviu:308_4: bhavati. piṇḍapātaparacittasya bhikṣoḥ sarvā diśo 'pratikūlā bhavanti gamanāya. ime
SA01mkarmviu:309_0: LXXX. daśa vaiśāradyāni. katamāni daśa. ucyate. viśārado grāmaṃ praviśati. viśārado
SA01mkarmviu:309_1: grāmān niṣkrāmati. viśāradaḥ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṅkte. viśāradaḥ pariṣadi dharmaṃ deśayati.
SA01mkarmviu:309_2: viśāradaḥ saṃghamadhyam avatarati. viśārada ācāryopādhyāyān upasaṃkrāmati. viśārado
SA01mkarmviu:309_4: paribhuṅkte. grāhyaṃ cāsya vaco bhavati. imāni daśa vaiśāradyāni.
